name: internalStudyId
displayName: The internal ID of the study.

name: unitOfAnalysis
displayName: Basic unit of analysis or observation that this Dataset describes, such as individuals, families/households, groups, institutions/organizations, administrative units, and more. For information about the DDI's controlled vocabulary for this element, please refer to the DDI web page at http://www.ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies.

name: researchInstrument
displayName: Type of data collection instrument used. Structured indicates an instrument in which all respondents are asked the same questions/tests, possibly with precoded answers. If a small portion of such a questionnaire includes open-ended questions, provide appro (â€¦)

name: samplingProcedure
displayName: Type of sample and sample design used to select the survey respondents to represent the population. May include reference to the target sample size and the sampling fraction.

name: samplingProcedureDetails
displayName: Details about the type of sample and sample design used to select the survey respondents to represent the population. May include reference to the target sample size and the sampling fraction.

name: collectionMode
displayName: Method used to collect the data; instrumentation characteristics (e.g., telephone interview, mail questionnaire, or other).

name: timeMethod
displayName: The time method or time dimension of the data collection, such as panel, cross-sectional, trend, time- series, or other.

name: topicTaxon
displayName: The classification field indicates the broad important topic(s) and subjects that the data cover. Library of Congress subject terms may be used here.

name: dataSources
displayName: List of books, articles, serials, or machine-readable data files that served as the sources of the data collection.

name: topicClassification
displayName: The classification field indicates the broad important topic(s) and subjects that the data cover. Library of Congress subject terms may be used here.

name: topicClassValue
displayName: Topic or Subject term that is relevant to this Dataset.

name: topicClassVocab
displayName: Provided for specification of the controlled vocabulary in use, e.g., LCSH, MeSH, etc.

name: topicClassVocabURI
displayName: Specifies the URL location for the full controlled vocabulary.
blockURI: Enter full URL, starting with http://
